text:
Shop the Gucci loafers and mules your favorite celebrities can't get enough of.

JENNIFER ANISTON Alo Ceballos/GC Images The Friends alum gave her everyday look a hint of luxury flair with a pair of black Gucci mules ($595; neimanmarcus.com).

Vanessa Hudgens RWK/ZOJ/WENN The actress was spotted heading to the gym wearing a Koral sports bra, but not in a conventional pair of sneakers. Hudgens wore her workout-ready look with a pair of furry Gucci mules ($995; neimanmarcus.com), because who says high-fashion and athleisure can't mix?

Gigi Hadid James Devaney/GC Images Hadid looked pretty in pink as she (and a giant bouquet of roses) rang in her 22nd birthday in N.Y.C. The birthday girl took to the streets in a pink pair of fur-lined Gucci mules ($995; www.nordstrom.com), cuffed boyfriend jeans, a cropped tee, and an Alice and Olivia duster.

Kris Jenner AKM GSI The famed momager dressed up an all-black ensemble with a hot pink pair of patterned Gucci slides (shop a similar style here).

Katie Holmes starzfly/Bauer-Griffin/GC Images The former teen star took her style know-how to the skies on Friday, arriving at LAX in a pair of light-wash ripped jeans, an off-white jacket, floppy beige sun hat, Gucci loafers ($630; saksfifthavenue.com), and a Gucci handbag ($2,890; net-a-porter.com).

Katie Holmes AKM-GSI The actress touched down at JFK Airport in a chic printed topper that she paired with straight-leg jeans. A pair of classic Gucci loafers ($630, nordstrom.com) and a coordinating handbag completed her winning travel look.

Rachel Bilson WENN Making a rare appearance, the O.C. alum stepped out in L.A. wearing an army green cargo jacket, jeans, a gray felt hat, and a pair of fur-lined Gucci slides ($995; ssense.com).

Leslie Mann William Volcov/Brazil Photo Press/LatinContent/Getty Images The actress sported her classic Gucci kicks ($630; net-a-porter.com) while out in New York City. She paired them with a chic plaid coat, black turtleneck top, and dark denim skinny jeans, and finished her look with dark sunnies and bright coral lipstick.

Gigi Hadid Splash News The top model dressed down her rose-embroidered Gucci fur slides with an oversize hoodie and black leather leggings while out in New York City ($995; mytheresa.com).

KRIS JENNER X17online.com The Kar-Jenner matriarch gave her all-white look a splash of whimsy with these red leather fur-lined Gucci mules ($995; neimanmarcus.com).

KENDALL JENNER GINO/AKM-GSI The 21-year-old channeled her outer wild child in a floor skimming leopard print coat and loafer-front Gucci boots ($1,290; ssense.com).

JADEN SMITH Jason LaVeris/FilmMagic We're totally lusting after Jaden's embroidered serpentine loafers ($750; neimanmarcus.com).

KESHA Axelle/Bauer-Griffin The singer glammed up her look with a glittering pair of Gucci pumps ($870; saksfifthavenue.com).

EMMA ROBERTS Bauer-Griffin/GC Images The Scream Queen kept her look classic with black leather Gucci loafers ($640; net-a-porter.com).

SOFIA RICHIE AKM-GSI The 18-year-old went retro with velvet, fur-lined Gucci slides (in turquoise; $850; mytheresa.com).

GWEN STEFANI Bauer-Griffin/GC Images The singer drove us B-A-N-A-N-A-S in this pair of bold loafers ($630, saksfifthavenue.com).

Emily Ratajkowski Vince Flores/startraksphoto.com The model shone on an L.A. outing in golden Gucci slides ($595; bloomingdales.com).

REESE WItHERSPOON Milton Ventura/Broadimage The Oscar-winner added a fun pop of color to her look with these glamorous Gucci loafer-pumps ($790; neimanmarcus.com).

dakota johnson Venturelli/Getty The Fifty Shades star gave her look a Gucci edge with a pair of loafer-front booties ($1290; net-a-porter.com).

Aziz Ansari TheImageDirect.com Aziz Ansari looked as though he stepped out of a scene from Ocean's Eleven in New York, where his shirt screamed cool and his pants screamed chill. The Gucci slippers ($650; netaporter.com) though? A surprising sight on a man more known for his quick wit than his fashion. It's a new dawn, it's a new day.

GIGI HADID Marc Piasecki/GC Images The Victoria's Secret model stepped out in Paris on Nov. 28 in a très chic pair of emboidered Gucci slippers ($995; mytheresa.com).

MANDY MOORE Splash News The This Is Us star topped off her eclectic Los Angeles look with a pair of red leather Gucci slides ($595; www.nordstrom.com).

ALEXA CHUNG Vittorio Zunino Celotto/Getty Images The stylish Brit can't get enough of her fur-lined Gucci mules ($995; neimanmarcus.com). The elegant slipper-fit makes them the perfect shoe for any dresscode.

MINDY KALING Josiah Kamau/BuzzFoto Kaling explored the set of Ocean's Eight in a pair of floral embroidered Princetown slides ($750; saksfifthavenue.com).

ASHLEY BENSON itsashbenzo/Instagram This Pretty Little Liar rocked her U.K. street style in a pair of Princetown Studded Genuine Shearling Mule Loafers ($1,190; www.nordstrom.com).

DAKOTA FANNING Freddie Baez/startraksphoto.com The 22-year-old actress gave her N.Y.C. look an emerald edge with glamorous Gucci loafers with pearl-laden heels ($1,100 in black; mytheresa.com).
title: Celebrities Who Love Their Gucci Loafers and Mules
